name: Gordon Ramsay
description: Gordon Ramsay is a Scottish chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He has owned and operated a series of successful restaurants, and is known for his fiery temper and sharp tongue on shows like 'Hell's Kitchen' and 'Kitchen Nightmares'.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
method: Preheat a griddle pan over a high heat.
Cut the chicken into thin strips, then slice the onion and peppers.
In a bowl, mix the smoked paprika, cumin, and the juice of half a lime.
Add the chicken to the spice mix and toss to coat.

name: Jamie Oliver
